gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pacers 150, Hawks 116
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pacers defeated the Hawks, 150-116. Myles Turner recorded 27 points, five rebounds, and three assists for the Pacers, with Tyrese Haliburton adding 10 points, 18 assists, and eight rebounds in the victory. Dejounte Murray tallied 30 points and two assists for the Hawks in the losing effort. The Pacers have won six games in a row and improve to 20-14 in the regular season, while the Hawks fall to 14-19.
